articles.title: Apple to unveil two new Macs at WWDC 2022, including the long-awaited MacBook Air - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: Purportedly, Apple is already preparing to release two new Mac devices, just a few months after the arrival of the Mac Studio and Studio Display. According to new rumours, WWDC 2022 will be the launch platform for at least the MacBook Air.
articles.content: Last week, Apple announced that this year's World Wide Developers Conference (WWDC) would begin on June 6, with WWDC 2022 set to last until June 10. Typically, Apple uses WWDC to unveil operating sys… [+1211 chars]
